chara.textHome: Thank goodness...
I wondered what I'd do if no one showed up.
And I came in my swimsuit, too...
Did I get a bit carried away?
T-Tsuruno Exercise 1!

You, um, move your body like
this while chanting 1, 2, 3, 4...

Tsuruno told me it gets you going
early in the morning!
I found you, Mr. Kitty!

Cats really are great at
scouting out cool places...

Sure, it's noon, but I could easily
spend some time relaxing here.
I wonder if Felicia's going to be okay.

She always gets tired from playing all day
so by the time it gets dark, she hasn't
done her chores or homework yet...
Yachiyo's going to be so mad...

A cool breeze, the tinkling of a wind chime...
The drone of bugs outside,
the bright moon among the clouds...
I'm so happy, sleeping here with everyone.

I always felt really stifled on trips
with my family.
It's so different here...
It's really fun, laughing with your loved ones!
I-I'm always ready to go hunt a Witch!
A-ah, but wait a moment!

When I change back from my Magical Girl
outfit I'll end back up in my swimsuit...
Will that be okay?

Ah... If I go to Endless Mirrors in a swimsuit, 
there will be a bunch of copies of me
in a swimsuit...

I feel like it would be crazy if I went
in a bunch of different outfits.
Hee...hee hee...

If you dip your feet in the waves,
the sand gives way and you sink a little bit...
It's fun to watch.

Doesn't shaved ice with melon syrup
on it looks funny?

Like a thaw that started from the 
mountain peak and worked its way down...

There's actually an episode of Mr. Purrs-a-lot
where they go to the beach.

Darkrow the crow flew through the sky
to deliver a seal baby, and then...
*Sob*
I knew this would be embarrassing...

I've never been to the beach with people
before, so it feels kind of weird

when I think about how they'll look at me
when I'm wearing my swimsuit...
I need to relax...

Iroha said she can't swim, so I was thinking
maybe I could invite her to the pool?
We can practice together...
I wonder if she'd come.
I got so shocked it upset my stomach...

Tusurno and Felicia put all their might
into the ball when they spike it every time...

Um, did you notice the little
octopus-shaped hot dogs?
I made them.

I wanted to help out with something,
so Yachiyo taught me how.
EEEEEEK! S-s-stooop!
Don't set fireworks off right under my feet!
H-honestly! That's seriously really scary!
*Sob*
...Oh, no, I...I'm actually very happy!

I never thought that I'd have such a
lovely time...and make so many
wonderful, fun memories...
